title: Pes hostel review rr campus
content: Can anybody say the pros and cons of pes hostel in rr campus I mean like the curfew,food ( non-veg) gym available or not and many more......

comments.body:
Curfew - Come back before 10pm and ull be good. 

Food - There's 3 messes , personally I have no problems the food is pretty good. Im a vegetarian tho but they I know they give non veg around 3 times a week.

Gym - Campus gym is available till 7:15pm and its very close to hostel

Laundry services are inside hostel , there's a good study room , small table tennis,foozball , carrom and chess area and a vending machine. That's pretty much it. Rooms are good , especially the ones with the attached bathroom and wifi works fine. 

  
The only cons are that it's hard to get hostel right now because of the demand
Hostel fees for rooms with attached bathroom through kcet
Will the hostel be available after the final round of kcet
is the curfew the same for boys and girls? also if i am not a bangalore resident will i get one of the newer blocks easily?
Not really. Unless you have prior connections or referrals, it's pretty much impossible to get hostel in 3rd round.
Is there any problem with common bathrooms in boys hostel( rr campus) , and will it be crowded in morning ?
